page.title: 07THE JAZZ BAND IN CWMGORS
page.content: THE LOCAL JAZZ BAND IS CALLED CWMGORS VALLEY TROOPERS.I STARTED IN THE BAND WHEN I WAS 10 YRS OLD. OUR TRAINER'S NAME IS KEN DAVIES. WE HAVE FIVE COMMITTEE MEMBERS WHO HELP TO RUN THE BAND. THE BAND STARTED IN 1980 AND NOW THERE ARE 32 MEMBERS AGED BETWEEN SEVEN TO EIGHTEEN. IN THE AUTUMN WE DO NOT COMPETE SINCE MOST BANDS, LIKE US, ARE PRACTISING FOR THE SUMMER EVENTS. WHEN I STARTED I WAS PLACED BEHIND THE DRUMS AND LATER WHEN I COULD KEEP IN STEP I WAS PUT INTO THE LAST RANK.THEN AS I IMPROVED I WAS ALLOWED TO ENTER THE COMPETITIONS. AFTER BEING IN THE BAND FOR NEARLY ONE YEAR I HAVE MANAGED TO COMPETE IN FIFTEEN COMPETITIONS AND WON FIVE MEDALS.
